response.overview: Two of adult's biggest stars collide in one of the most anticipated movies of the year: T&A. Teagan Presley and Alexis Texas give you an inside look at their most personal fantasies, giving you insight to what turns them on, and what makes them who they are. From sultry rendezvous with adult stars Allie Haze and Andy San Dimas, to powerhouse, non-stop sex with some of the biggest males stars. Get ready for five of the hottest scenes ever to be filmed. Once you get into the minds of Teagan and Alexis, you will never want to leave.
response.title: T & A
